item.title: Chastity add a quote by Dorothy Canfield Fisher
item.description: "...there are two ways to meet life; you may refuse to care until indifference becomes a habit, a defensive armor, and you are safe - but bored. Or you can care greatly, live greatly, until life breaks you on its wheel. " -- Dorothy Canfield Fisher

item.title: Chastity add a quote by Dorothy Canfield Fisher
item.description: "If we would give, just once, the same amount of reflection to what we want out of life that we give to the question of what to do with a two weeksâ€™ vacation, we would be startled at our false standards and the aimless procession of our busy days." -- Dorothy Canfield Fisher
